verses.verse: Awake, <S%H5782><s%> awake; <S%H5782><s%> put on <S%H3847><s%> thy strength, <S%H5797><s%> O Zion; <S%H6726><s%> put on <S%H3847><s%> thy beautiful <S%H8597><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> O Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> city: <S%H5892><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> henceforth <S%H3254><s%> there shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> come <S%H935><s%> into thee the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> and the unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

Shake thyself <S%H5287><s%> from the dust; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6083><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> and sit down, <S%H3427><s%> O Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> loose thyself <S%H6605><s%> from the bands <S%H4147><s%> of thy neck, <S%H6677><s%> O captive <S%H7628><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Ye have sold yourselves <S%H4376><s%> for naught; <S%H2600><s%> and ye shall be redeemed <S%H1350><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> money. <S%H3701><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> formerly <S%H7223><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> and the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> oppressed <S%H6231><s%> them without cause. <S%H657><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, what <S%H4100><s%> have I here, <S%H6311><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> is taken away <S%H3947><s%> for naught? <S%H2600><s%> they that rule over <S%H4910><s%> them make them to howl, <S%H3213><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and my name <S%H8034><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is blasphemed. <S%H5006><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> my name: <S%H8034><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> they shall know in that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am he <S%H1931><s%> that doth speak: <S%H1696><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is I.

How <S%H4100><s%> beautiful <S%H4998><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are the feet <S%H7272><s%> of him that bringeth good tidings, <S%H1319><s%> that publisheth <S%H8085><s%> peace; <S%H7965><s%> that bringeth good tidings <S%H1319><s%> of good, <S%H2896><s%> that publisheth <S%H8085><s%> salvation; <S%H3444><s%> that saith <S%H559><s%> unto Zion, <S%H6726><s%> Thy God <S%H430><s%> reigneth! <S%H4427><s%>

Thy watchmen <S%H6822><s%> shall lift up <S%H5375><s%> the voice; <S%H6963><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> shall they sing: <S%H7442><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they shall see <S%H7200><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> to eye, <S%H5869><s%> when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring again <S%H7725><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

Break forth into joy, <S%H6476><s%> sing <S%H7442><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> ye waste places <S%H2723><s%> of Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath comforted <S%H5162><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> he hath redeemed <S%H1350><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath made bare <S%H2834><s%> <S%H853><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the nations; <S%H1471><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>

Depart <S%H5493><s%> ye, depart <S%H5493><s%> ye, go ye out <S%H3318><s%> from thence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> no <S%H408><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing; go ye out <S%H3318><s%> of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of her; be ye clean, <S%H1305><s%> that bear <S%H5375><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> with haste, <S%H2649><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> by flight: <S%H4499><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; and the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will be your rearward. <S%H622><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> shall deal prudently, <S%H7919><s%> he shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%> and extolled, <S%H5375><s%> and be very high. <S%H1361><s%> <S%H3966><s%>

As <S%H834><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> were astonished <S%H8074><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> thee; his visage <S%H4758><s%> was so <S%H3651><s%> marred <S%H4893><s%> more than any man, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H376><s%> and his form <S%H8389><s%> more than the sons <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of men: <S%H120><s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> shall he sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations; <S%H1471><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> shall shut <S%H7092><s%> their mouths <S%H6310><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> him: for <S%H3588><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> had not <S%H3808><s%> been told <S%H5608><s%> them shall they see; <S%H7200><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> they had not <S%H3808><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> shall they consider. <S%H995><s%>
